Units for age.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.Luis.DateTimeSpec
member.summary: Represents the built-in LUIS date-time type.
member.remarks: LUIS recognizes time expressions like "next monday" and converts those to a type and set of timex expressions. More information on timex can be found here: http://www.timeml.org/publications/timeMLdocs/timeml_1.2.1.html#timex3. More information on the library which does the recognition can be found here: https://github.com/Microsoft/Recognizers-Text.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.Luis.DateTimeSpec.#ctor(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The type of TIMEX expression.
The TIMEX expression.
member.exception: is null or contains only white space, or is null.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.Luis.DateTimeSpec.Type
member.summary: Gets type of expression.
member.remarks:
Example types include:
time -- simple time expression like "3pm".
date -- simple date like "july 3rd".
datetime -- combination of date and time like "march 23 2pm".
timerange -- a range of time like "2pm to 4pm".
daterange -- a range of dates like "march 23rd to 24th".
datetimerange -- a range of dates and times like "july 3rd 2pm to 5th 4pm".
set -- a recurrence like "every monday".
member.value: The type of expression.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.Luis.DateTimeSpec.Expressions
member.summary: Gets Timex expressions.
member.value: Timex expressions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.Luis.LuisRecognizer.TopIntent(Microsoft.Bot.Builder.RecognizerResult,System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the name of the top scoring intent from a set of LUIS results.
member.param: Result set to be searched.
(Optional) Intent name to return should a top intent be found. Defaults to a value of "None".

(Optional) Minimum score needed for an intent to be considered as a top intent. If all intents in the set are below this threshold then the `defaultIntent` will be returned. Defaults to a value of `0.0`.
member.returns: The top scoring intent name.

members.member:
Fills the event properties for LuisResult event for telemetry. These properties are logged when the recognizer is called.
Last activity sent from user. Context object containing information for a single turn of conversation with a user. Additional properties to be logged to telemetry with the LuisResult event. A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation. additionalProperties A dictionary that is sent as "Properties" to IBotTelemetryClient.TrackEvent method for the BotMessageSend event.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.Luis.LuisRecognizer.BuildLuisRecognizerOptionsV2(Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.Luis.LuisApplication,Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.Luis.LuisPredictionOptions,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a LuisRecognizerOptions object with the correspondig version. If no V2 LuisPredictionoption passed it sets the recognizer to use Luis V3 endpoint. This exists to maintain backwards compatibility with existing constructors.
member.param: LuisAplication object to initialize LuisReognizerOptions.
If passed a LuisRecognizerOptionsV2 will be returned initialized with this object.
Boolean value to initialize IncludeAPIResults .
member.returns: LuisRecognizerOptions object.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.LuisV3.LuisPredictionOptions
member.summary: Optional parameters for a LUIS prediction request.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.LuisV3.LuisPredictionOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.LuisV3.LuisPredictionOptions.#ctor(Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.LuisV3.LuisPredictionOptions)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from an existing instance.
member.param: Source of values.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.LuisV3.LuisPredictionOptions.IncludeAllIntents
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether all intents come back or only the top one.
member.value: True for returning all intents.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.LuisV3.LuisPredictionOptions.IncludeInstanceData
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not instance data should be included in response.
member.value: A value indicating whether or not instance data should be included in response.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.LuisV3.LuisPredictionOptions.IncludeAPIResults
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether API results should be included.
member.value: True to include API results.
member.remarks: This is mainly useful for testing or getting access to LUIS features not yet in the SDK.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.LuisV3.LuisPredictionOptions.Log
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether queries should be logged in LUIS.
member.value: If queries should be logged in LUIS in order to help build better models through active learning.
member.remarks: The default is to log queries to LUIS in order to support active learning. To default to the Luis setting set to null.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.LuisV3.LuisPredictionOptions.DynamicLists
member.summary: Gets or sets dynamic lists used to recognize entities for a particular query.
member.value: Dynamic lists of things like contact names to recognize at query time.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.LuisV3.LuisPredictionOptions.ExternalEntities
member.summary: Gets or sets external entities recognized in the query.
member.value: External entities recognized in query.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.LuisV3.LuisPredictionOptions.PreferExternalEntities
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether external entities should override other means of recognizing entities.
member.value: Boolean for if external entities should be preferred to the results from LUIS models.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.LuisV3.LuisPredictionOptions.Slot
member.summary: Gets or sets the LUIS slot to use for the application.
member.value: The LUIS slot to use for the application.
member.remarks: By default this uses the production slot. You can find other standard slots in . If you specify a Version, then a private version of the application is used instead of a slot.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.LuisV3.LuisPredictionOptions.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets the specific version of the application to access.
member.value: Version to access.
member.remarks: LUIS supports versions and this is the version to use instead of a slot. If this is specified, then the is ignored.

member.summary: Gets the currently configured that logs the LuisResult event.
member.value: The being used to log events.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Bot.Builder.AI.LuisV3.LuisRecognizer.TopIntent(Microsoft.Bot.Builder.RecognizerResult,System.String,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns the name of the top scoring intent from a set of LUIS results.
member.param: Result set to be searched.
(Optional) Intent name to return should a top intent be found. Defaults to a value of "None".

(Optional) Minimum score needed for an intent to be considered as a top intent. If all intents in the set are below this threshold then the `defaultIntent` will be returned. Defaults to a value of `0.0`.
member.returns: The top scoring intent name.

member.summary: Runs an utterance through a recognizer and returns a generic recognizer result.
member.param: Turn context.
A instance to be used by the call. This parameter gets merged with the default passed in the constructor.
Cancellation token.
member.returns: Analysis of utterance.

member.summary: Return results of the analysis (Suggested actions and intents).
member.param: Context object containing information for a single turn of conversation with a user.
Additional properties to be logged to telemetry with the LuisResult event.
Additional metrics to be logged to telemetry with the LuisResult event.
A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.returns: The LUIS results of the analysis of the current message text in the current turn's context activity.
